tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ai_ethics_transparency (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    decision_id INT NOT NULL,
    decision_description TEXT,
    decision_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Transparency_Ethical_Decision_Making (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ai_model_name VARCHAR(255),
    decision_input TEXT,
    decision_output TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Ethical_Decision_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    decision VARCHAR(255),
    decision_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transparency_and_accountability (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ai_system_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    decision_context TEXT,
    transparency_score INT,
    accountability_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE accountability_record (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ai_system_id INT NOT NULL,
    decision_made DATETIME,
    decision_explanation TEXT,
    reviewed_by VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (ai_system_id) REFERENCES transparency_and_accountability(id)
);

CREATE TABLE decision (
	decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	decision_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	review_id INT NOT NULL,
	transparency_rating FLOAT,
	accountability_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE transparency_and_accountability (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(255),
  decision_date DATE,
  decision_explanation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE model_performance (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(100),
  accuracy DECIMAL(5, 2),
  precision DECIMAL(5, 2),
  recall DECIMAL(5, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE algorithm_tracking (
  algorithm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  algorithm_name VARCHAR(100),
  last_used TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE decision_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  decision_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  explanation TEXT
)
